The Big Noise -1944 (74 min) and The Bullfighters - 1945 (1945) will be shown on the Fox Movie Channel (that I don't get) on the following dates:

The Big Noise
Directed by Malcolm St Clair. Starring Stan Laurel, Oliver Hardy, Doris Merrick, Arthur Space, Philip Van Zandt, Francis Ford, Veda Ann Borg, Robert Blake. 
A pair of detectives try to safeguard a new kind of bomb. Click here for more info on the movie. 90 minutes- NR, 1944, BW 

Thu  Sep  7  09:00A on Fox Movie Channel

&

The Bullfighters
Directed by Malcolm St Clair. Starring Stan Laurel, Oliver Hardy, Margo Woode, Richard Lane, Carol Andrews, Diosa Costello. 
Detectives in Mexico bungle a case. Click here for more info on the movie. 90 minutes- NR, 1945, BW 

Sat  Sep 30  10:30A on Fox Movie Channel

Maybe someone can record these two movies digitally and share them via torrent. You need a DVR and DVD-,+RW disks that you can copy to a PC.

Other L & H movies not included in the 21 disk collection are:

The Devil's Brother-1933(90min)
Babes in Toyland-1934 (77min)
Bonnie Scotland-1935 (80min)
The Flying Deuces-1939 (69min)
Great Guns-1941 (74min)
A-Haunting We Will Go - 1942 (68min)
Air Raid Wardens - 1943 (67min)
Nothing But Trouble -1944 (69min)
Utopia(a.k.a. A Toll K) - 1951 (88min)

plus the two I previously listed above:

The Big Noise - 1944 (74min) 
The Bullfighters - 1945 (60min) 

There are a total of eleven (11) missing movies that would complete the collection of all L & H movies. 

Please tell me if I left any out.

Try this filmography link.
http://www.povonline.com/laurelandhardy/LH01.htm

TPB deleted a few of these Hexen-NI Laurel and Hardy torrents because of outdated trackers and external tracker urls in the torrent.  I have found them all on other tracker sites, and attempted to correct them for posting on TPB.  However, I thought I knew how to do that, but when I tried it it appeared that I would have to remove trackers that contained active seeds and I didn't want to create a gimpy torrent.  So... I created a torrent filled with all of Hexen-NI's torrents.  Kinda lame, I Know.  Here it is: http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3969220/Laurel_and_Hardy_DVD_Vol_1-21_Torrents_by_Hexen-NI

Also... I've ripped all of these DVD's to XviD, and I'll post a torrent with these soon (when my seeding capacity isn't saturated by all these ISO's)
As promised, the entire collection's DVD Rips in XviD format: http://thepiratebay.org/tor/4021071/Laurel_and_Hardy_Movies_-_DVDRips_-_142_Movies
